exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gamePower" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0" source="loading_04_png"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="loading_02_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.gameSettingSlider" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0" source="gameUISheet_json.game2"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" verticalCenter="0" source="gameUISheet_json.game3" width="40" height="40"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="backpackPanel" width="730" height="1392" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="leftAnimation">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_itemIRRight1}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="150">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{198}" y="{14.5}" scaleX="{0.95}" scaleY="{0.95}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{275}" y="{29}" scaleX="{0.9}" scaleY="{0.9}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_itemIRLeft1}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="150">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{137}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{-1}" y="{29}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_itemIRCenter}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="150">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{60}" y="{14.5}" scaleX="{0.95}" scaleY="{0.95}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{121}" y="{0}" scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="rightAnimation">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_itemIRRight1}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="150">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{137}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{275}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_itemIRLeft1}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="150">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{76}" y="{14.5}" scaleX="{0.95}" scaleY="{0.95}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{-1}" y="{29}" scaleX="{0.9}" scaleY="{0.9}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_itemIRCenter}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="150">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object y="{14.5}" scaleX="{0.95}" scaleY="{0.95}" x="{182}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:Wait duration="50"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object x="{121}" y="{0}" scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image id="m_imgBg" height="1394" bottom="0" left="0" right="0" source="procBg1_png"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnReturn" label="" left="2" top="14">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnProcReturn_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="m_btnRight" label="" right="-7" verticalCenter="-41">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSwap_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="m_btnLeft" label="" verticalCenter="-41" left="-6" scaleX="-1">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSwap_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="procBg5_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-466.5"/>
	<e:Group id="m_groupItemIR" width="582.6" height="584" horizontalCenter="0" anchorOffsetX="0" verticalCenter="-33">
		<ns1:ItemIR id="m_itemIRRight2" width="341.6" height="584" horizontalCenter="156" verticalCenter="0" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" x="233" y="39" visible="false"/>
		<ns1:ItemIR id="m_itemIRLeft2" width="341.6" height="584" horizontalCenter="-156" verticalCenter="0" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" x="243" y="49" visible="false"/>
		<ns1:ItemIR id="m_itemIRRight1" width="341.6" height="584" scaleX="0.9" scaleY="0.9" x="275" y="29"/>
		<ns1:ItemIR id="m_itemIRLeft1" width="341.6" height="584" scaleX="0.9" scaleY="0.9" x="-1" y="29"/>
		<ns1:ItemIR id="m_itemIRCenter" width="341.6" height="584" x="121" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="m_btnUse" label="" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="231.5">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnUse_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image id="m_itemTypeBg" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="129" source="ItemBg1003_png"/>
	<e:Image id="m_curItem" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="150" source="Icon1003_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="bottomBtn" width="640" height="124" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="m_groupBtn" height="124" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" y="0">
		<e:Button id="m_btnItem" label="" x="0" y="7" height="110" width="181">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn3" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn3"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="m_btnAchieve" label="" x="230" y="7" height="110">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn2" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn2"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="m_btnRank" label="" x="460" y="7" height="110">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btn3" source.down="btnSheet_json.btn3"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="victoryPanel" width="730" height="1392" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="Show">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_groupGameOver}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}" scaleY="{0}" alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500" ease="backOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_btnReturn}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="600">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="250">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_btnAgain}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="600">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="250">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="Hide">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_btnReturn}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_btnAgain}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_groupGameOver}">
				<tween:Set/>
				<tween:To duration="500">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="-15" bottom="-25" source="mask_png" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Button id="m_btnReturn" label="" left="20" top="21">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btnReturn"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Button id="m_btnAgain" label="" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="125">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" width.down="90%" height.down="90%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btnSheet_json.btnAgain"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Group id="m_groupGameOver" width="445" height="306" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-120" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image height="307" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" top="0" source="commonPanel_png" scale9Grid="180,90,484,64"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labTitle" text="本次得分" x="142" y="11.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="40"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labScore" text="56" y="106" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="120" textColor="0xfba706" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labHistory" text="历史最高分：" x="78.5" y="261.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0x868491"/>
		<e:Label id="m_labHistoryScore" text="1000" x="269" y="261.5" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textAlign="left" textColor="0x868491"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameScenePanel" width="730" height="1392" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="readyAnimate">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{ready}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}" scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}" scaleX="{1.2}" scaleY="{1.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1.3}" scaleY="{1.3}" alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
			<tween:TweenItem target="{go}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:Wait duration="850"/>
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1.2}" scaleY="{1.2}" alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1.3}" scaleY="{1.3}" alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="quitPanel" width="730" height="1392" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="show">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_groupLnstall}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}" scaleY="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500" ease="backOut">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="hide">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{m_groupLnstall}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{1}" scaleY="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="500" ease="backIn">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleX="{0}" scaleY="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
